[00:00.00]Moral of the Story(feat. Niall Horan) (Explicit) - Ashe/Niall Horan (奈尔·霍兰)
[00:05.28]Lyrics by：Ashlyn Willson/Casey Smith/Finneas O’Connell/Noah Conrad/Niall Horan
[00:10.57]Composed by：Ashlyn Willson/Casey Smith/Finneas O’Connell/Noah Conrad/Niall Horan
[00:15.85]So I never really knew you
[00:18.23]God I really tried to
[00:20.27]Blindsided addicted
[00:24.08]Thought we could really do this
[00:26.23]But really I was foolish
[00:28.10]Hindsight it's obvious
[00:32.16]Talking with my lawyer
[00:33.59]She said Where'd you find this guy
[00:35.55]I said Young people fall in love
[00:37.76]With the wrong people sometimes
[00:40.41]Some mistakes get made
[00:42.20]That's alright that's okay
[00:44.20]You can think that you're in love
[00:46.21]When you're really just in pain
[00:48.60]Some mistakes get made
[00:50.18]That's alright that's okay
[00:52.18]In the end it's better for me
[00:54.11]That's the moral of the story babe
[00:57.36]Oh oh oh oh
[01:01.34]Oh oh oh oh
[01:04.55]It's funny how a memory
[01:06.61]Turns into a bad dream
[01:08.50]When running wild turns volatile
[01:12.47]It's not funny how it changes
[01:14.74]Ended up like strangers
[01:16.57]We burned down a paper house
[01:20.53]Talking with your father
[01:22.10]He said that you could be mine
[01:24.13]But some people fall in love
[01:26.29]With the wrong people sometimes
[01:29.00]Some mistakes get made
[01:30.74]That's alright that's okay

[01:40.69]In the end it's better for me
[01:42.66]That's the moral of the story babe
[01:46.10]Oh oh oh oh
[01:49.61]Oh oh oh oh
[01:53.54]Oh oh oh oh
[01:57.15]Oh oh oh oh
[02:00.48]They say it's better to have loved and lost
[02:04.97]Than never to have loved at all
[02:09.16]That could be a load of s**t
[02:13.02]But I just need to tell you all
[02:19.20]Some mistakes get made
[02:20.88]That's alright that's okay
[02:22.96]You can think that you're in love

[02:27.47]Some mistakes get made

[02:32.83]That's the moral of the story

[ti:Moral of the Story(feat. Niall Horan) (Explicit)]

[00:05.28]//
[00:10.57]//
[00:15.85]所以我从未真正了解你
[00:18.23]天啊我真的尽力了
[00:20.27]措手不及沉醉其中
[00:24.08]以为我们真的可以做到
[00:26.23]可我真的好傻
[00:28.10]马后炮显而易见
[00:32.16]和我的律师交谈
[00:33.59]她说你在哪里找到这个男人的
[00:35.55]我说年轻人谈恋爱
[00:37.76]有时和不合适的人在一起
[00:40.41]犯下一些错误
[00:42.20]没关系没关系
[00:44.20]你可以以为你恋爱了
[00:46.21]当你真的很痛苦时
[00:48.60]犯下一些错误
[00:50.18]没关系没关系
[00:52.18]到最后对我来说会更好
[00:54.11]这就是这个故事的寓意宝贝
[00:57.36]//
[01:01.34]//
[01:04.55]可笑的是一段回忆
[01:06.61]变成一场噩梦
[01:08.50]当狂放不羁变得不稳定
[01:12.47]这样的变化一点都不好笑
[01:14.74]最后形同陌路
[01:16.57]我们烧毁了一座纸房子
[01:20.53]和你的父亲交谈
[01:22.10]他说你可以属于我
[01:24.13]但有些人坠入爱河
[01:26.29]有时和不合适的人在一起
[01:29.00]犯下一些错误
[01:30.74]没关系没关系
[01:32.78]你可以以为你恋爱了
[01:34.78]当你真的很痛苦时
[01:37.15]犯下一些错误
[01:38.77]没关系没关系
[01:40.69]到最后对我来说会更好
[01:42.66]这就是这个故事的寓意宝贝
